author: ScriptAutomate
body:
Linux install documentation doesn't include any information about packages.microsoft.com, which was announced last month as supporting package hosting for PowerShell Core:
https://blogs.msdn.microsoft.com/powershell/2017/02/01/installing-latest-powershell-core-6-0-release-on-linux-just-got-easier/

I am including what is practically a copy-paste, from the blog, for the respective distros.
